attributes.action: The BBC to remove the need for its viewers to have to pay a license fee!
attributes.background: The BBC (British Broadcasting Corporation) has become an embarrassment to the name British, they have lost the support of the people that pay for a Biases, Bogus and Corrupt TV broadcaster. The fair resolution would be for it to become a commercial funded broadcasting company!

rejection.details:
You may wish to sign the following petition, which calls for similar action:

Scrap the BBC TV Licence & replace funding with adverts or paywall
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/727365
